snippet: Barcelona seized control of its Copa del Rey quarterfinal against Atlético Madrid when Messi followed up his saved penalty shot with a goal for a 1-0 first-leg victory at home.
abstract: Barcelona defeats Atletico Madrid, 1-0, in its Copa del Rey quarterfinal; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Barcelona seized control of its Copa del Rey quarterfinal against Atlético Madrid when Messi followed up his saved penalty shot with a goal for a 1-0 first-leg victory at home.

headline.main: Barcelona Gains Edge on Lionel Messi’s Goal
headline.print_headline: Barcelona Gains Edge on Messi’s Goal
